about.title: About me
about.description: My name's Hugo. I'm a full-stack developer. Currently, I have just been graduated for a Bachelor's degree in Application Design and Development in Dijon, with a view to training in this field of IT. I'm interested in 💻 new technologies and 👨‍💻 computer science in general. I'm passionate about 🎮 video games and their 🎨 creative fields. I'm curious by nature and I want to progress in IT. I'm always looking to improve in what I do or produce in general, as well as being able to work independently.
